content.text: Hello, my name is Daniel Jackson, I am the person interested in registering for the New York City Marathon. I am writing this email to answer some of the questions about my daily routine. I am a morning person; <font color=red>I always wake up at 5:00 AM</font>. I leave my house for running 6 km, and then I return home. I take a shower at 7:00 am, and after that, <font color=orange>I go to work</font>. I frequently have a snack during lunchtime. When <font color=blue>I get home around 6:00 PM</font>, I take my dog for a walk in the park two blocks away from my house. It is difficult to control him because he is too big, but he helps me to exercise my arms. I rarely sleep late; <font color=green>I usually go to bed around 10:00 PM</font>. On weekends <font color=cyan-10>I go for a walk with my family</font>, then eat at a restaurant. As you can see, I am a person with a very calm routine, thank you for your comments.
